content.text: Spain's main goalkeeper appears to be Iker Casillas. He is described as having 166 caps for Spain, which is the highest number of caps mentioned for any of the goalkeepers.
The midfielder with the most goals for Spain is David Silva with 23 goals in 97 caps.
